reviews.review_header: after 3 months it will star lagging and battrey back up sucks to the core

reviews.review_header: Internal Memory 4 GB only not 8 GB
reviews.review_text: Specification in the box is showing Internal memory 8 GB but in the Tab storage its showing Total Internal memory 4 GB, used for application 1 GB and balance 3 GB. yes we can expand but why they mentioned 8 GB.

We cant expect a tab from 3k rupees range features of 10k+ tab. But what i feel and disappointed is screen quality. The prime purpose of buying this tab is read pdf filesAnd now i feel blurry and reflective making eyes strain. Otherwise all features are good considering the low budget. Remember it's not 15 or 20k tab
Experience more than expectations. Problem is only one that battery drain little fast. Overall I am very satisfied. Also thanks to amazon, for delivering to my location.
PERFECTLY ALRIGHT--USING CONTINOUSLY--I FEEL IT IS A GOOD PURCHASE

People may say this and that. But with respect to the price this is The Best Tab you can get.  Am still using it with no issues for a week. Dont think much. If your budget is around 3K there is no need to search more because you already have come to the very right page.

I would like to tell you that the tablet is very nice at this price. Video and gaming experiences are very good and also the processor is good and sound quality in the year phone is also good. Only thing is you can not insert a Sim but camera I don't think I can give any points. But overall the tablet is very good.

Micromax Canvas Tab P290 TabletTab is good , if you are at Home better than any Other Mobile. Best for Children , Best for Gifting on b'days .  This TAB has  quit good , I am writing some Pros as well cons in this Review , First Check them out and then decide :-============IN THE BOX============1. One Tab2. USB Cable3. Adapter4. User Guide===============First Some Pros===============1. Value for Money Product Is Under 3.5 K with 7 INCH screen.2. Powered by MediaTek MT8127A Processor with clock speed of .3GHz with 4 Cores good for Performance .3. Screen Resolution 1024 x 600 pixels is Okay not very Good , But enough for a Tablet .4.  Good For Children with Low Price.5. 8GB internal with expandable up to 32GB with the  1GB RAM is Quit good .6. Definitely Better than - Data-wind TAB,7. Screen is Quit Good And Responsive.==================================List of Cons (Only if we Excuse the Price )==================================1. No SIM card, works only with WIFI. Many Tabs are coming with SIM card Option .2. 2820mAH Battery is Not Enough , You can only Enjoy 1 to 2 Movies with this Power Capacity .3.  Old O.S Android's 5.0 Lollipop is Available No Updates for Futures.4.  it is Heavy Approx 260 Grams without Cover and 300 Grams with Protective Cover .5. Camera Quality is not Very Good , It has only 2MP Primary and 0.3============  VERDICT============Finally I think it is Not very BAD Product, If We See the Price Tag .  It didn't disappoint You, You are Getting A lot of whether you are paying only 3000 Rupees.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------=============Tips For Buyers==============1. Amazon always running some offer like Festival offers :- Check them on HOME PAGE of AMAZON.2. Buy Gift Cards for Shopping : You can Get Some Discounts by using them .3. If you Get this Review Helpful Please Thumbs Up ! :)

Good tab. Works pretty fast. Good for normal use of internet and apps. Also able to play the latest popular games. Have not tried it with any heavy duty games as I am not a gamer. Sound quality is good. Overall , a very good deal at this price point.

reviews.review_header: Except for little poor LCD display and display lag while streaming vedios
reviews.review_text: Totally worth the money. Except for little poor LCD display and display lag while streaming vedios, the touch sensitivity, audio quality and rest all the features are good enough for the price.

I think it's just for the first time user of smartphone and tab user.  Many issues with my tab.  Once internal storage remains less than 2 gb out of 4gb it starts hanging. Apps arranged on screen automatically disappear. If you keep plugged in after 100% it starts reducing 98%97% and so on.  Usb connection to pc do not detect memory card regularly.  Do not support pendrive or data card through otg so only depend on Wifi.  When Wifi is turned on backup is less than 2 hours.  I tried first time to return but no response from amazon.  No contact option to seller. It have hotspot I don't know why because it cannot work with both functions on.Suggestion -  if you want a tab for reading books, newspaper, checking mails, and watching videos with  minimal or say no app or have budget problem (on Wifi only) then go for it but if you want to  use almost everything you can do on pc then avoid it.I am ready to help anyone wants to know anything about it before buying just write below and wait few hours.  I have been using this for more than a month.

reviews.review_header: Faulty tab, no response on feedback
reviews.review_text: Picture speaks...
good look and feel. battery backup is okish. that i guess is the only turn off. everything else is fine, good tab overall if you don't mind the less powerful battery.Screen casting feature is a plus.

reviews.review_header: Design is good. There are no colour options
reviews.review_text: Don't believe negative reviews.First read this full review,then decide to buy.I bought this tab for Rs 2800(including 500 cash back) in paytm.Design:Design is good.There are no colour options.Only you can get black colour.On the back side of the tab you can see Micromax logo and Canvas Tab Text.Overall design is good.Display:There is WSVGA TFT IPS display.I thought it would be bad.But it is very nice.Storage:There is only 8 GB internal.You get around 4 GB usable.Many people complain about storage issue.I will say solution to it later in this review.You can expand the storage by adding SD card.Performance:No hanging issues.Able to run moderate games like subway surfers,temple run and mini miltia.I played heavy games like asphalt 8,asphalt 7,modern combat 5,asphalt xtreme,nova 3 and gangster Vegas.Whatsapp is working.Just download whatsapp apk.All ran well.Browsing is smooth.It is powered by 1.3 gh mediatek quad core processor with 1 GB of ram.No other tab offers this specification at this price.Battery:Many people complain about poor battery life.Thanks to lollipop OS.Lolipop has a battery saver that on when your battery is 15%.But you can on whenever you want.You can do this by going to setting-battery-battey saver and on it.It works well.I play mini militia with friends via LAN WiFi.I had 15% battery.I turned on battery saver.I played 3 matches each lasting 15 minutes.Then the battery was 12%.Reading purposes:I also use this tablet to study.Display is good for reading.I turn on battery saver when I want to read.I also watch videos from learnnext which requires flash.I just installed dolphin browser and flash player apk and enabled flash from settings in dolphin browser.It ran well.So you can see flash content.I also have Microsoft Office Apps.Connectivity:Wifi range is very good.No SIM slot.But when your in a non wifi zone.Just turn on hotspot from your phone and connect it in your tab.Then you can browse.Camera:Camera is not great.Rear camera is 2 MP and front is a VGA Camera.You can improve picture clarity by installing Google camera.Protecting the tablet:Many find it difficult to find a case for this.Buy ACM 360 degree rotating case.There are many colour options.I have the red one.Dont buy flip covers.Their quality is not good.Buy the case from eBay cause it is just 179 rupees.Amazon adds shipping charges.Screen protector that comes with the tab is good.Rooting:You can root this tab using KingRoot.Then download Linktosd and move every user apps to SD card.I have 5 heavy games that are more than 1GB everything in SD.Game OBB and Data files save in sd card.So no storage issues.You can also install game mods such as Xmod.Overall:This tab is best for 3K.You can go blindly without thinking.Micromax has done a good job.Don't forget to hit helpful button.

reviews.review_header: There are better Tabs out there
reviews.review_text: Tab is OK but extremely low battery life even without any user apps running combined with a LOUSY  charger...stopped working in less than a week !!!!You get what you pay for...a cheap tablet

I ordered for a replacement... Have to wait n see whether I will get a better one. Unnecessary waste of time.

reviews.review_text: Wrongly Advertised product. Display is not IPS. But fools buyers as high quality IPS display. actually low quality display basic lcd. not worth for the money.

reviews.review_header: Go for it if you are looking for a tab under 4000 inr .absolutely worth it  !!!
reviews.review_text: Guys , go for it , exellent packing and amazing speed speed delivery by amazon , its a best budget tab under 4000 inr which u can get . awesome tab with 1 gb ram which allows to play heavy games like asphalt smoothly.

This tablet is actually a  nice handset. The day it came it was a bit though to handle it but later it became handy. This was my first tablet  and it proved out to be pretty good except  for the camera which is not a big deal.

Gr8 product and good price, if voice calling is not required then this is the best tab available at this price, I bought it from my lil daughter, she is enjoying her rhymes and games on the tab, I am thoroughly satisfied

This is the best tablet i found in this price range , i have been using this for 7 days now and trust me its working absolutely fine with no lags.to be more precise i am using this for just watching Videos on Youtube, i haven't played any games on it yet.Speaking about Prons-1) Price - For me i purchased it for 2999/-2) It has 1 GB RAM and 8 GB ROM at such a cheap price.3) Battery back up i found good can watch 2 to 3 movies on 1 charge.4) Display is good at this price5) It supports OTG (I havent tested it yet)Cons- Its just about the camera but who uses camera in a Tab, u can make video calls and that's what the camera is for.Verdict- If u r tight on ur budget and if u r getting this for 2999 or around 3500 go for it blindly or if u can add little more money , I will suggest go for Lenovo Tab 2 A7-20 which costs u arround 4500 to 5000 reason is just because it has IPS display.

reviews.review_header: Great tab for the given price with modest features.
reviews.review_text: Delivery was really swift. Product  is good and does Web browsing well. Display isn't good(viewing angles are worst). One can experience stock android for the price. Experience is consistent.Please don't peg hopes with its camera. I brought it for Web browsing & mild gaming and the tab does its job by far.  Thanks to Cloudtail & Blue Dart.Pros: Affordability,Lollipop 5.0, user friendly,no heating issue,good performance,simple but handy design.Cons: Battery life sucks,recharging the battery is like a decennial affair,Camera,display quality.If camera & display isn't the issue,it could be the best tab within the range of 10k.

The colours & display are not that great especially in bright light.  For the price, it might be offering good value.It is bought for a specific usage; hoping it will serve that purpose and lasts long with public use.

Excellent !! Its a cheap and best tablet under Rs. 4000 . And its gpu is mali-450 mpIt can easily run the games .. I played big games like "gangster vegas ","the dark knight rises","indigo propacy/farenheit","mortal kombat x", "gta san andreas " .,etc., the games can be played without lags.!!

Received item within 3 days of ordering with normal delivery. The box include tablet, charger with USB cable, an OTG cable and screen protector.Pros:It is really cheapThe tab is faster with 1gb RAM, 1.3 GHz quad core processor. Never felt lag for browsing, using Facebook and YouTube.Wifi reception is goodThe tab comes with stock ROM and an app from micromax. No custom skins or interface.No heating issues while normal usage.Cons:The battery drains very quickly, tab will run about 4 hours on internet browsing.The charge is slow as compared to other devices of similar size battery using same charger.The screen display uses old technology, if you are getting used to IPS display you will notice the difference.Overall:The tab is good if you are tight on budget. You get what you pay. It is not good to compare this tab with other tabs of price ten times. You can use this tab for reading ebooks, emails, browsing internet, watching movie. The tab is not definitely for high end games and heavy apps.

It's a very good tab.  I got it for Rs. 3579 super deal.  The tab is well responsive, super smooth touch, high end gaming is well supported. Entry level MediaTek CPU.  MALI 450 mp2 from arm .  Nice GPU  & CPU. Average display and good sound quality.  Best budget tablet from Micromax.
I've used P275 & have to say that instead of wasting money on Micromax tablet, buy a 5 inch smartphone. You won't regret later.

reviews.review_header: Ok for basic use... Stopped workingafter a month!
reviews.review_text: Its alright to use as a basic tab for pdf reading or occassional browsing. Basic budget device. So dont have high flying expectations at all. Yet to know about device life as I have just purchased it... It has stopped working now. A month after purchase ! Now will have to send it to the service centre and all that. Suggest spend a 1500 more and buy a better brand.

This is perhaps the cheapest tablet you will find in the market. I bought it for my 4 years old who is hooked on Youtube videos. The only downsides I found were the battery and the display. Display is PATHETIC!! A slight diversion from the front causes screen to change its colour completely. Battery takes too much time to charge, but depletes decently. Other than that I have no complaints for the price I bought it (which was 3150 INR).

WORST WORST!!!! worst product ever. It got damaged in a week. They are not even replacing it. the screen is showing white blank and they are not even replying, replacing. The service is also not too good, just okay. But really the product is worst. I am gonna file a customer's case against it if they don't replace it in the court.

reviews.review_header: The best seller!!! Grab it guys!!! Its a good entertainer tablet
reviews.review_text: Hey guys im reviewing this micromax tab p290 tabletWith this tab enjoy gaming and moviesGood for the price quoteDecent specs to hold you activities(Note; supports no calling)Lets see the features;2MP primary camera with and 0.3MP front facing camera7-inch (17.78 centimeters) WSVGA TFT IPS capacitive touchscreen with 1024 x 600 pixels resolutionAndroid v5.0 Lollipop operating system with 1.3GHz quad core processor1GB RAM and 8GB internal memory expandable up to 32GB2820mAH lithium-ion battery providing HD video playback time of 3 hours, internet browsing time of 4 hours and standby time of 150 hoursContent inside the box;TabletChargerUsb cableOtg cableWarranty card and screen guardIts a best seller tablet!!!So final verdict;Go for it blindly and grab itIts a best seller tablet in the price segmentI hope this helped you guys........If yes then click on helpfulThank you ;-).

reviews.review_header: overall the tablet performance is good but it becomes very heat while charging and sometimes ...
reviews.review_text: I am using the tablet for 10 days.. overall the tablet performance is good but it becomes very heat while charging and sometimes while watching youtube. The problem was there at an initial stage and now it is okay but the device does get heat while charging. Browsing, watching videos and using apps is okay and no issues. I am just using the tablet only for browsing issues and not for playing games. If you are looking for a tab for games, think over before buying it.
Display gone within 40 days..The phone is dead now. Not sure how i can claim the warranty!!!

reviews.review_header: This Tablet is awesome. Best tab under 4k
reviews.review_text: This Tablet is awesome.Best tab under 4k.To test its power i install Autodesk 123D Sculpt+ (a 3d sculpting app from Autodesk) and woo thats works but to save some internal storage later i uninstalled it. Power of 1 gig ram and Quad core processor.Cameras are not that great need extra light for better pic quality, but i am happy with it. Connect mouse,pen-drive,external USB Sound card via otg cable. I think it support almost every plug and play USB devices (i am not sure). Display is great I'm happy. I got 4gb internal storage including OS and pre-instaled apps.Charger quality is good.Battery backup not that bad its average.
Sells as 8 gb but actual memory is 4gb. Takes forever to charge. Would never recommend this product.
there never can be a non calling tab better than this

reviews.review_header: Don't buy this product. Tab is not charging and ...
reviews.review_text: Don't buy this product. Tab is not charging and its automatically charged after power dry and hanging issues. I went service center and they told, there was some hardware issue in this product. Then they replaced new one after 35 days. I just used only 10 days. I suggest please go with other product.

The product is worthy for its price. Display quality is really bad. It is very harmful to your eyes. It causes a great strain. Battery drains fast if internet is used. Google Chrome becomes slow gradually. Another disadvantage is the viewing angle. However OTG cable, and screen card are also included in the box. Both Cameras are bad.

This is value for money tab .  In shortPros: Good for internet surfing through wifi, viewing pdfs, ppts, movies ,it has loud audio, has simple fm with good quality audio,  can play light games, kids app, good battery backup. Has Android lollipop version. Pendrive can be connected. Tab is Light weight.Good as photo slide show. No heating or hanging problem yet. Good for students. Using it since two weeks and faced no problem.Cons:Low pixel density(167ppi) therefore text cannot be smooth and sharp, no magnetic sensor therefore no compass app works for direction, no Flash, no calling. But still I have given 5 stars for its value for money.Got from Flipkart at 3000rs -10% on sbi card. Package contains tab, charger with cable, otg cable, screen guard and manual.  Press the helpful button if you think so.

Worst product i bought in my life, in 20 days its display not working...and service center guys are also good for nothing and they are just hurry to go home...I have submitted the tab in service center and waiting for its repair done..please think before buy it...

Excellent product and fast processor.  We are playing big size games also and it works very fast. We have installed 1.72 gb game Asphalt 8 airborne. It's running excellent.  The delivery was super fast. We got it the next day of order.
Switch on and touch screen not at all working. Not sure how these products are sold. Literally spoiling Amazon branding

Superb  tablet.  Totally  satisfied.  I'm in love  with  this tab.  Killer looks, awesome  screen touch, fast possessing, overall good  tab. Totally  worth the money.  Actually  I didn't  expect  this much out of 3500.
Everything good. Display can only be viewed in one particular angle ans it's hard to maintain that angle of sight

I gifted this to my mother around 4 months back and it has been performing really well even after heavy usage. Apart from the screen quality everything's great. Good value for money. Excellent for youtube videos and general browsing. Not good for reading.

Display quality is not good.But at this price, its satisfactory. Still I would recommend, go for another one with higher budget because when you use this product for more hours, eyes hurt like anything, doesn't feel comfortable with the display.

The device itself is an absolute gem. It's just perfect for reading epub and Kindle.

reviews.review_header: Design is good. There are no colour options
reviews.review_text: Don't believe negative reviews.First read this full review,then decide to buy.I bought this tab for Rs 2800(including 500 cash back) in paytm.Design:Design is good.There are no colour options.Only you can get black colour.On the back side of the tab you can see Micromax logo and Canvas Tab Text.Overall design is good.Display:There is WSVGA TFT IPS display.I thought it would be bad.But it is very nice.Storage:There is only 8 GB internal.You get around 4 GB usable.Many people complain about storage issue.I will say solution to it later in this review.You can expand the storage by adding SD card.Performance:No hanging issues.Able to run moderate games like subway surfers,temple run and mini miltia.I played heavy games like asphalt 8,asphalt 7,modern combat 5,asphalt xtreme,nova 3 and gangster Vegas.Whatsapp is working.Just download whatsapp apk.All ran well.Browsing is smooth.It is powered by 1.3 gh mediatek quad core processor with 1 GB of ram.No other tab offers this specification at this price.Battery:Many people complain about poor battery life.Thanks to lollipop OS.Lolipop has a battery saver that on when your battery is 15%.But you can on whenever you want.You can do this by going to setting-battery-battey saver and on it.It works well.I play mini militia with friends via LAN WiFi.I had 15% battery.I turned on battery saver.I played 3 matches each lasting 15 minutes.Then the battery was 12%.Reading purposes:I also use this tablet to study.Display is good for reading.I turn on battery saver when I want to read.I also watch videos from learnnext which requires flash.I just installed dolphin browser and flash player apk and enabled flash from settings in dolphin browser.It ran well.So you can see flash content.I also have Microsoft Office Apps.Connectivity:Wifi range is very good.No SIM slot.But when your in a non wifi zone.Just turn on hotspot from your phone and connect it in your tab.Then you can browse.Camera:Camera is not great.Rear camera is 2 MP and front is a VGA Camera.You can improve picture clarity by installing Google camera.Protecting the tablet:Many find it difficult to find a case for this.Buy ACM 360 degree rotating case.There are many colour options.I have the red one.Dont buy flip covers.Their quality is not good.Buy the case from eBay cause it is just 179 rupees.Amazon adds shipping charges.Screen protector that comes with the tab is good.Rooting:You can root this tab using KingRoot.Then download Linktosd and move every user apps to SD card.I have 5 heavy games that are more than 1GB everything in SD.Game OBB and Data files save in sd card.So no storage issues.You can also install game mods such as Xmod.Overall:This tab is best for 3K.You can go blindly without thinking.Micromax has done a good job.Don't forget to hit helpful button.
Very bad product; which I have seen in myllife. ..wish I give it 0 view...
I've used P275 & have to say that instead of wasting money on Micromax tablet, buy a 5 inch smartphone. You won't regret later.

reviews.review_header: Don't buy this product. Tab is not charging and ...
reviews.review_text: Don't buy this product. Tab is not charging and its automatically charged after power dry and hanging issues. I went service center and they told, there was some hardware issue in this product. Then they replaced new one after 35 days. I just used only 10 days. I suggest please go with other product.

reviews.review_header: The product screen is more of like a mirror
reviews.review_text: The product screen is more of like a mirror.. while reading the only thing you will be able to see properly is only your face no matter how you tries to adjust brightness or viewing modes. So there remains no further scope to do anything better with it. So don't buy this its simply waste of money and more over if u tries to contact their  customer care they will give you good lip service than to seriously resolving the issue that the product delivered could be faulty also.

Google Chrome becomes slow gradually. Another disadvantage is the viewing angle. However OTG cable, and screen card are also included in the box. Both Cameras are bad.
